pros: Nice place to work and nice people

review_title: Great experience, but terrible advancement opportunities
pros: I had amazing coworkers that I built long-term connections with. The students are amazing, and it’s great to building relationships with them. I earned a lot of experience while I was there.
cons: You will probably never get a raised while you are there (2 years or 20 years… not kidding). It’s also very hard to get a promotion (the marketing team had two people).

job_title: Director of Student Life in Defiance, OH
pros: Amazing family environment, everyone is very kind and supportive
cons: The salary isn't high for the tasks you are being asked to do

job_title: Assistant Track and Field Coach in Defiance, OH
cons: The outdoor facility is not up to date. Needs to be redone to be able to host meets or practice on. The athletic department needs some real changes to be successful. I would rank the college education a 3/10

pros: Coworkers were great to work with
cons: Our boss was rude and a micromanager. Glad to see she is gone now.

job_title: Executive Administrative Assistant in Defiance, OH
pros: The professors and certain departments are amazing. They are all so helpful.
cons: Administration and student life. Student life has runs the college and no one will do anything to correct the situation.

pros: Great bunch of people that work there!
cons: College is failing. There is a revolving door of staff, faculty, and coaches.  There has been so much turn over, nobody really knows what their job is.  Great place to get stuck in a rut and lose years of your life with no advancement or pay increase.

pros: DC was an incredibly friendly and supportive place to work. Colleagues were enthusiastic and hopeful.
cons: As a tuition driven institution with small enrollment, budgets were extremely challenging. Compensation, vacation time, and benefits are below average for the industry.

pros: Very congenial work environment, pleasant colleagues, nice students

pros: Passion for working with students of all ages.
